name: mundaydreaming
description:
In mundaydreaming, you play as office worker Norman as he attempts to escape from his mundane life into a world of fantasy where he can be the hero. Run through the world as it oscillates between his reality of avoiding monotonous office work and his fantasy of slaying dragons.

We didn’t finish in time to submit for Ludum Dare 49 (Theme: Unstable), but we hope you still stop by and enjoy our game!

Controls:

A - move left
D - move right
Spacebar - jump (and double jump)
Left-click - shoot (while in fantasy mode)
ESC - Pause

Team:

Aaron Isara
Ray Hsiao
